text: Her cyþ on þissere bec þæt Gedmer Spernægles sune hæfð alised Leofilde his maga ut of Toppesham lande mid IIII & XX penuge at Ceolrice, Heordinges gereua Eadnoðes sune.
And þærto is gewittnes, Ælwine preost, & Ailword Pudding, & Heording, & his broðras, & Wulword at Iacobes circan, & Huga se ræda.
And eall þæt hundred at Toppeshamme.
And se þe þis undo, habbe Godes curs, & Sancta Maria, efre butan ende.
